entry.title: India Takes Cautious Steps Toward Ties With Taliban
entry.content: While New Delhi remains wary of security threats from Afghanistan, Indian officials are bolstering their presence in the country amid concerns about the influence of China and Pakistan in the region.

entry.title: China's Economic Slump Bodes Ill for Birth Numbers
entry.content: China aims to lift births, but some demographers expect its population to shrink as soon as this year as job uncertainties push young people to delay having children.
